:py:mod:`skpm.event_logs.download`
==================================

.. py:module:: skpm.event_logs.download


Module Contents
---------------


Functions
~~~~~~~~~

.. autoapisummary::

   skpm.event_logs.download.download_url
   skpm.event_logs.download._save_response_content
   skpm.event_logs.download._urlretrieve



.. py:function:: download_url(url: str, folder: Optional[str] = None, file_name: Optional[str] = None) -> str

   Download a file from a `url` and place it in `folder`.

   :param url: URL to download file from
   :type url: str
   :param folder: Folder to download file to.
                  If None, use the current working directory. Defaults to None.
   :type folder: str, optional
   :param file_name: Name to save the file under.
                     If None, use the basename of the URL. Defaults to None.
   :type file_name: str, optional

   :returns: Path to downloaded file
   :rtype: folder (str)


.. py:function:: _save_response_content(content: Iterator[bytes], destination: str) -> None


.. py:function:: _urlretrieve(url: str, destination: str, chunk_size: int = 1024 * 32) -> None
